access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Whistle of Calling](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1578)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 91</row>

**Price** 6,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _whistle of calling_ appears to be a simple brass whistle. It changes slightly in appearance depending on the type of creature to which it's attuned, depicting small carvings of hooves, feather patterns, claws, or other appropriate motifs.

<document level="2" id="action-1192" />

<document level="2" id="action-1193" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
